verses.verse: וַיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> become בִּימֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> Now it came to pass in the days אֲחַשְׁוֵר֑וֹשׁ <S%H325><s%> of Ahasuerus ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אֲחַשְׁוֵר֗וֹשׁ <S%H325><s%> (this [is] Ahasuerus הַמֹּלֵךְ֙ <S%H4427><s%> which reigned מֵהֹ֣דּוּ <S%H1912><s%> from India וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> unto כּ֔וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> even unto Ethiopia שֶׁ֛בַע <S%H7651><s%> and seven וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty וּמֵאָ֖ה <S%H3967><s%> [over] an hundred מְדִינָֽה׃ <S%H4082><s%> provinces

בַּיָּמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> [That] in those days הָהֵ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> those כְּשֶׁ֣בֶת ׀ <S%H7675><s%> place הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> when the king אֲחַשְׁוֵר֗וֹשׁ <S%H325><s%> Ahasuerus עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> on כִּסֵּ֣א <S%H3678><s%> on the throne מַלְכוּת֔וֹ <S%H4438><s%> of his kingdom אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּשׁוּשַׁ֥ן <S%H7800><s%> which [was] in Shushan הַבִּירָֽה׃ <S%H1002><s%> the palace

בִּשְׁנַ֤ת <S%H8141><s%> year שָׁלוֹשׁ֙ <S%H7969><s%> In the third לְמָלְכ֔וֹ <S%H4427><s%> of his reign עָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> he made מִשְׁתֶּ֔ה <S%H4960><s%> a feast לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all שָׂרָ֖יו <S%H8269><s%> unto all his princes וַעֲבָדָ֑יו <S%H5650><s%> and his servants חֵ֣יל ׀ <S%H2426><s%> army פָּרַ֣ס <S%H6539><s%> of Persia וּמָדַ֗י <S%H4074><s%> and Media הַֽפַּרְתְּמִ֛ים <S%H6579><s%> the nobles וְשָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> and princes הַמְּדִינ֖וֹת <S%H4082><s%> of the provinces לְפָנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> [being] before

בְּהַרְאֹת֗וֹ <S%H7200><s%> When he shewed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֹ֙שֶׁר֙ <S%H6239><s%> the riches כְּב֣וֹד <S%H3519><s%> of his glorious מַלְכוּת֔וֹ <S%H4438><s%> kingdom וְאֶ֨ת־ <S%H853><s%> יְקָ֔ר <S%H3366><s%> and the honour תִּפְאֶ֖רֶת <S%H8597><s%> of his excellent גְּדוּלָּת֑וֹ <S%H1420><s%> majesty יָמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> days רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> many שְׁמוֹנִ֥ים <S%H8084><s%> and fourscore וּמְאַ֖ת <S%H3967><s%> [even] an hundred יֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> days

וּבִמְל֣וֹאת ׀ <S%H4390><s%> were expired הַיָּמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> And when these days הָאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these עָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> made הַמֶּ֡לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> unto all the people הַנִּמְצְאִים֩ <S%H4672><s%> that were present בְּשׁוּשַׁ֨ן <S%H7800><s%> in Shushan הַבִּירָ֜ה <S%H1002><s%> the palace לְמִגָּ֧דוֹל <S%H1419><s%> both unto great וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against קָטָ֛ן <S%H6996><s%> and small מִשְׁתֶּ֖ה <S%H4960><s%> a feast שִׁבְעַ֣ת <S%H7651><s%> seven יָמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> days בַּחֲצַ֕ר <S%H2691><s%> in the court גִּנַּ֥ת <S%H1594><s%> of the garden בִּיתַ֖ן <S%H1055><s%> palace הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> of the king's

ח֣וּר ׀ <S%H2353><s%> [Where were] white כַּרְפַּ֣ס <S%H3768><s%> green וּתְכֵ֗לֶת <S%H8504><s%> and blue אָחוּז֙ <S%H270><s%> [hangings] fastened בְּחַבְלֵי־ <S%H2256><s%> with cords ב֣וּץ <S%H948><s%> of fine linen וְאַרְגָּמָ֔ן <S%H713><s%> and purple עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and גְּלִ֥ילֵי <S%H1550><s%> rings כֶ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> to silver וְעַמּ֣וּדֵי <S%H5982><s%> and pillars שֵׁ֑שׁ <S%H8336><s%> of marble מִטּ֣וֹת ׀ <S%H4296><s%> the beds זָהָ֣ב <S%H2091><s%> [were of] gold וָכֶ֗סֶף <S%H3701><s%> and silver עַ֛ל <S%H5921><s%> on רִֽצְפַ֥ת <S%H7531><s%> upon a pavement בַּהַט־ <S%H923><s%> of red וָשֵׁ֖שׁ <S%H8336><s%> marble וְדַ֥ר <S%H1858><s%> and white וְסֹחָֽרֶת׃ <S%H5508><s%> and black

וְהַשְׁקוֹת֙ <S%H8248><s%> And they gave [them] drink בִּכְלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> in vessels זָהָ֔ב <S%H2091><s%> of gold וְכֵלִ֖ים <S%H3627><s%> (the vessels מִכֵּלִ֣ים <S%H3627><s%> vessels שׁוֹנִ֑ים <S%H8138><s%> being diverse וְיֵ֥ין <S%H3196><s%> wine מַלְכ֛וּת <S%H4438><s%> and the royal רָ֖ב <S%H7227><s%> in abundance כְּיַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> according to the state הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> of the king

וְהַשְּׁתִיָּ֥ה <S%H8360><s%> And the drinking כַדָּ֖ת <S%H1881><s%> [was] according to the law אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> there אֹנֵ֑ס <S%H597><s%> none did compel כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for כֵ֣ן ׀ <S%H3651><s%> so יִסַּ֣ד <S%H3245><s%> had appointed הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> for so the king עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> unto כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> each רַ֣ב <S%H7227><s%> to all the officers בֵּית֔וֹ <S%H1004><s%> of his house לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <S%H6213><s%> that they should do כִּרְצ֥וֹן <S%H7522><s%> pleasure אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> according to every man's וָאִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> person

גַּ֚ם <S%H1571><s%> also וַשְׁתִּ֣י <S%H2060><s%> Also Vashti הַמַּלְכָּ֔ה <S%H4436><s%> the queen עָשְׂתָ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> made מִשְׁתֵּ֣ה <S%H4960><s%> a feast נָשִׁ֑ים <S%H802><s%> for the women בֵּ֚ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַמַּלְכ֔וּת <S%H4438><s%> [in] the royal אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which לַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> which [belonged] to king אֲחַשְׁוֵרֽוֹשׁ׃ <S%H325><s%> Ahasuerus ס

בַּיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <S%H7637><s%> On the seventh כְּט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> was merry לֵב־ <S%H3820><s%> when the heart הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king בַּיָּ֑יִן <S%H3196><s%> with wine אָמַ֡ר <S%H559><s%> he commanded לִ֠מְהוּמָן <S%H4104><s%> Mehuman בִּזְּתָ֨א <S%H968><s%> Biztha חַרְבוֹנָ֜א <S%H2726><s%> Harbona בִּגְתָ֤א <S%H903><s%> Bigtha וַאֲבַגְתָא֙ <S%H5><s%> and Abagtha זֵתַ֣ר <S%H2242><s%> Zethar וְכַרְכַּ֔ס <S%H3752><s%> and Carcas שִׁבְעַת֙ <S%H7651><s%> the seven הַסָּ֣רִיסִ֔ים <S%H5631><s%> chamberlains הַמְשָׁ֣רְתִ֔ים <S%H8334><s%> that served אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> in פְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> in the presence הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king אֲחַשְׁוֵרֽוֹשׁ׃ <S%H325><s%> of Ahasuerus

לְ֠הָבִיא <S%H935><s%> To bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> וַשְׁתִּ֧י <S%H2060><s%> Vashti הַמַּלְכָּ֛ה <S%H4436><s%> the queen לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king בְּכֶ֣תֶר <S%H3804><s%> with the crown מַלְכ֑וּת <S%H4438><s%> royal לְהַרְא֨וֹת <S%H7200><s%> to shew הָֽעַמִּ֤ים <S%H5971><s%> the people וְהַשָּׂרִים֙ <S%H8269><s%> and the princes אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָפְיָ֔הּ <S%H3308><s%> her beauty כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for טוֹבַ֥ת <S%H2896><s%> for she [was] fair מַרְאֶ֖ה <S%H4758><s%> to look on הִֽיא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וַתְּמָאֵ֞ן <S%H3985><s%> refused הַמַּלְכָּ֣ה <S%H4436><s%> But the queen וַשְׁתִּ֗י <S%H2060><s%> Vashti לָבוֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> to come בִּדְבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> commandment הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> at the king's אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> after בְּיַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> by הַסָּרִיסִ֑ים <S%H5631><s%> [his] chamberlains וַיִּקְצֹ֤ף <S%H7107><s%> wroth הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> therefore was the king מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> very וַחֲמָת֖וֹ <S%H2534><s%> and his anger בָּעֲרָ֥ה <S%H1197><s%> burned בֽוֹ׃

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Then the king לַחֲכָמִ֖ים <S%H2450><s%> to the wise men יֹדְעֵ֣י <S%H3045><s%> which knew הָֽעִתִּ֑ים <S%H6256><s%> the times כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for כֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> so דְּבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> manner הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> (for so [was] the king's לִפְנֵ֕י <S%H6440><s%> toward כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יֹדְעֵ֖י <S%H3045><s%> all that knew דָּ֥ת <S%H1881><s%> law וָדִֽין׃ <S%H1779><s%> and judgment

וְהַקָּרֹ֣ב <S%H7138><s%> And the next אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him כַּרְשְׁנָ֤א <S%H3771><s%> unto him [was] Carshena שֵׁתָר֙ <S%H8369><s%> Shethar אַדְמָ֣תָא <S%H133><s%> Admatha תַרְשִׁ֔ישׁ <S%H8659><s%> Tarshish מֶ֥רֶס <S%H4825><s%> Meres מַרְסְנָ֖א <S%H4826><s%> Marsena מְמוּכָ֑ן <S%H4462><s%> [and] Memucan שִׁבְעַ֞ת <S%H7651><s%> the seven שָׂרֵ֣י ׀ <S%H8269><s%> princes פָּרַ֣ס <S%H6539><s%> of Persia וּמָדַ֗י <S%H4074><s%> and Media רֹאֵי֙ <S%H7200><s%> which saw פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> face הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king's הַיֹּשְׁבִ֥ים <S%H3427><s%> [and] which sat רִאשֹׁנָ֖ה <S%H7223><s%> the first בַּמַּלְכֽוּת׃ <S%H4438><s%> the kingdom

כְּדָת֙ <S%H1881><s%> according to law מַֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> what לַּעֲשׂ֔וֹת <S%H6213><s%> What shall we do בַּמַּלְכָּ֖ה <S%H4436><s%> unto the queen וַשְׁתִּ֑י <S%H2060><s%> Vashti עַ֣ל ׀ <S%H5921><s%> and אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not עָשְׂתָ֗ה <S%H6213><s%> because she hath not performed אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> מַאֲמַר֙ <S%H3982><s%> the commandment הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king אֲחַשְׁוֵר֔וֹשׁ <S%H325><s%> Ahasuerus בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> by הַסָּרִיסִֽים׃ <S%H5631><s%> chamberlain ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> answered [מוּמְכָן כ] (מְמוּכָ֗ן <S%H4462><s%> Memucan ק) לִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> before הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> the king וְהַשָּׂרִ֔ים <S%H8269><s%> and the princes לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> to the king לְבַדּ֔וֹ <S%H905><s%> only עָוְתָ֖ה <S%H5753><s%> hath not done wrong וַשְׁתִּ֣י <S%H2060><s%> Vashti הַמַּלְכָּ֑ה <S%H4436><s%> the queen כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> but all הַשָּׂרִים֙ <S%H8269><s%> only but also to all the princes וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> and to all the people אֲשֶׁ֕ר <S%H834><s%> who בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מְדִינ֖וֹת <S%H4082><s%> that [are] in all the provinces הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king אֲחַשְׁוֵרֽוֹשׁ׃ <S%H325><s%> Ahasuerus
